channel.title: RSS PAC UF5
channel.description: RSS creada para la PAC de desarrollo UF5. Guillermo Aguilar

item.title: Why you need to be at GitHub Satellite in a month
item.description: See why past attendees are returning to Satellite this year in Berlin on May 23—and how you can join them.

item.title: Game On—what was it like to make games during the 80s?
item.description: Join us for a chat with Kevin Savetz and Steve Meretzky about developing video games for Infocom in the 1980s.

item.title: Applications for GitHub Satellite scholarships tickets are now open
item.description: Apply for a free ticket to GitHub Satellite as part of our Scholarship Program.

item.title: Join us at Maintainerati Berlin
item.description: Maintainers: Join us at Maintainerati Berlin on May 24 to gather, present, and discuss the challenges of being an open source maintainer.

item.title: GitHub shares lessons learned from EU Copyright Directive at US DMCA roundtable
item.description: Find out what we shared at the US Copyright Office based on our experience with the EU Copyright Directive.
